content: christmas hearts yarn the thicker yarn you use the bigger the hearts will be hook suitable for the yarn you are using chain 17 1 1 double_crochet in 6 chain from hook 5 double_crochet chain 4 6 double_crochet chain 5 slip_stitch in bottom of last double_crochet 2 begins by crocheting along the opposite side of the foundation chain 4 double_crochet 1 double_crochet is replaced with chain 3 skip 4 4 double_crochet 9 double_crochet in chain 5 6 double_crochet 2 double_crochet + chain 4 + 2 double_crochet in chain 4 6 double_crochet 9 double_crochet in chain 5 slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet 3 2 double_crochet 1 double_crochet is replaced with chain 3 skip 4 stitches 3 double_crochet *2 double_crochet in next st* 8 times 8 double_crochet 2 double_crochet + chain 3 + 2 double_crochet in chain 4 8 double_crochet *2 double_crochet in next st* 8 times 1 double_crochet slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet 4 single_crochet in same as slip_stitch skip 2 stitches single_crochet in all other st pattern and images © silja-devine pattern written 13 11 2007
